about.title: About
paragraphs: Creative and driven, I am a Full-Stack Developer with a strong background in Information Systems Engineering. I specialize in building scalable web applications, intuitive user interfaces, and AI-powered systems with a human touch.
My experience spans banking platforms, predictive healthcare tools, and internal hospital systems — always focused on delivering clean code, performance, and user impact.
I thrive in Agile teams, love Figma as much as FastAPI, and remain obsessed with solving real-world problems using elegant technologies.
